title: 自动公告
author: ckg1302
txt_content:
使用bungeecord跨服，无论哪个服务端都会出现自动公告
内容：Don't forget to check out our website
Welcome to the server!
Welcome to the [服务器名称] server!
应该不是Spigot的问题，求帮忙

replies.author: zhangekun
replies.txt_content: 能否列出你的插件列表？

replies.author: ckg1302
replies.txt_content:
zhangekun 发表于 2018-8-25 11:59
能否列出你的插件列表？
BungeeFriends 1.2
BungeeKick
BungeeParties 1.1
BungeeSuite
SkinsRestorer

replies.author: 梦源细致
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: chtbthtk
replies.txt_content: 根目录下的文件瞅一眼，能用记事本打开的都看一眼

replies.author: ckg1302
replies.txt_content:
自行解决
在BungeeSuite配置文件夹里announcements.yml里撤销自动公告
